Now the theses of the mind as program and the irrelevance of the brain
would tell us that what matters about this story is not the specific biochemi-
cal properties of the angiotensin or the hypothalamus but only the formal
computer programs that the whole sequence instantiates. Well, let’s try that
out as a hypothesis and see how it works. A computer can simulate the for-
